issue.title: [CF 899] Alpha Flash with an opacity adjustment
issue.body:
I have noticed that blizz's default animation for buffs/debuffs doesn't flash all the way to 0%, rather it goes to 60% (maybe) and I was wondering if a corresponding slider "Icon: Alpha Flash" animation would be appropriate in order to have the same effect. I poked around the settings but couldn't find a solution.
